news.title: Storage in India’s key reservoirs drops below 90%
news.description: Storage in India's major reservoirs drops to 89% capacity amid 71% deficient rainfall, impacting rabi sowing and regional levels.
news.content:
The storage in the major 161 Indian reservoirs dropped to lower than 90 per cent of the capacity, with rainfall under the influence of the North-East monsoon taking a break.
